data.name: Nemithia - Tale of the Legendary Saviors Demo

fullgame.name: Nemithia - Tale of the Legendary Saviors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or newer
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or equivalent 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or newer
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
